question: Show currency exchange and ATM machines located near gate 10.
sql_query1:
SELECT Financial_Services.Name 
FROM Financial_Services
WHERE (Financial_Services.Type = "Currency Exchange Service" OR Financial_Services.Type = "ATM Machine") AND Financial_Services.Location_Within_Terminal = "Near Gate 10"
sql_query2:
SELECT Financial_Services.Name 
FROM Financial_Services
WHERE Financial_Services.Type = "Currency Exchange Service" OR Financial_Services.Type = "ATM Machine" AND Financial_Services.Location_Within_Terminal = "Near Gate 10"
interpretation1: What currency exchange services are located near gate 10 and what ATM machines are in the same location?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all currency exchange services and also provide a list of all ATM machines located near gate 10.
